summary: A film documentary about the fate of the young actors of the award winning film City of God by Fernando Meirelles and Katia Lund. It shows how their lives unfolded after the film's worldwide success.
cast: Alice Braga|Darlan Cunha|Renato de Souza|Leandro Firmino|Michel Gomes|Jonathan Haagensen|Seu Jorge|Ivan Martins|Thiago Martins|Luis Otávio|Felipe Paulino|Eduardo 'BR' Piranha|Alexandre Rodrigues|Roberta Rodrigues|Rubens Sabino|Bernardo Santos|Douglas Silva|Daniel Zettel
title: Ciudad de Dios: 10 años después
